scenarios.name: Modern Web Startup
scenarios.description: SaaS startup with microservices on standard web ports

optimal_strategy.reason: Pure web stack, no infra services. Nmap wastes time.

scenarios.name: CDN-Heavy E-commerce
scenarios.description: E-commerce site behind Cloudflare, minimal exposed services

optimal_strategy.reason: Only HTTPS behind CDN. Nmap gives no value.

scenarios.name: API Gateway Architecture
scenarios.description: Microservices behind API gateway, RESTful APIs

optimal_strategy.reason: API-only, no backend services exposed.

scenarios.name: Load Balanced Web Farm
scenarios.description: Multiple web servers behind load balancer

optimal_strategy.reason: Load balancer + web servers only. No infra.

scenarios.name: Development Web Environment
scenarios.description: Development servers for frontend/backend testing

optimal_strategy.reason: Dev servers, all web-based. No databases exposed.

scenarios.name: Database Server Cluster
scenarios.description: Production database servers with multiple DB types

optimal_strategy.reason: CRITICAL: Need service versions for all databases!

scenarios.name: Mail Server Infrastructure
scenarios.description: Enterprise mail server with SMTP/IMAP/POP3

optimal_strategy.reason: Mail services NEED version detection for vulnerabilities.

scenarios.name: SSH Infrastructure
scenarios.description: Server farm with SSH access and backend services

optimal_strategy.reason: SSH + databases = need version info!

scenarios.name: Enterprise Windows Domain
scenarios.description: Windows AD environment with RDP/SMB/MSSQL

optimal_strategy.reason: Windows infrastructure = CRITICAL service detection!

scenarios.name: Development Infrastructure
scenarios.description: Dev servers with databases and CI/CD

optimal_strategy.reason: Mix of CI/CD + databases = need full scan!

scenarios.name: Admin Panel Infrastructure
scenarios.description: Admin interfaces and control panels

optimal_strategy.reason: Admin panels = need to identify management software versions!

scenarios.name: Monitoring Stack
scenarios.description: Prometheus/Grafana/ELK monitoring infrastructure

optimal_strategy.reason: Monitoring stack = CRITICAL to identify versions!

scenarios.name: Full Stack Infrastructure
scenarios.description: Complete infrastructure with all services

optimal_strategy.reason: Everything exposed = MUST scan everything!

scenarios.name: Web + Monitoring
scenarios.description: Web application with Prometheus monitoring

optimal_strategy.reason: Mostly web, but Prometheus worth quick check.

scenarios.name: Web + Database
scenarios.description: Web application with exposed MySQL

optimal_strategy.reason: MySQL exposed = worth thorough scan for version!

scenarios.name: Web + SSH
scenarios.description: Web servers with SSH management access

optimal_strategy.reason: Mostly web, SSH worth quick version check.

scenarios.name: Web + Redis Cache
scenarios.description: Web application with Redis caching layer

optimal_strategy.reason: Redis exposed = worth checking version/config!

scenarios.name: Web + Multiple Backend Services
scenarios.description: Web frontend with multiple backend microservices

optimal_strategy.reason: Multiple custom ports = worth identifying services!

scenarios.name: Web + Admin Panel
scenarios.description: Public website with admin control panel

optimal_strategy.reason: Admin panel on 8443 worth quick check.

scenarios.name: Web + Mail Services
scenarios.description: Corporate website with mail server

optimal_strategy.reason: Mail server = worth thorough version detection!
